text: Revenge is an American television soap opera. It was first shown on 21 September 2011, on ABC. The series is about a woman who comes back to her childhood home to get revenge on her father's friends who betrayed him by accusing him of a terrorist plot that he did not commit. The plot is inspired by Alexandre Dumas' 1844 novel The Count of Monte Cristo. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2011 American television series debuts Category:2011 American television series endings Category:2010s American television series Category:American soap operas Category:Mystery television series Category:Revenge Category:Television series set in New York (state) Category:English-language television programs
title: Revenge (TV series)
